mapper.insert: insert into member (ID,M_CODE,PW,NAME,EMAIL,EMAIL_AGREE,SMS_AGREE,ADDRESS1,ADDRESS2,PHONE,SOL_LUN, INTRODUCE, coffee_favor, birth, post) values (#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},#{param5},#{param6},#{param7},#{param8},#{param9},#{param10},#{param11},#{param12},#{param13},#{param14}, #{param15})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{param1}
